info.title: Manufacturing Network Customer APIs
info.description:
A customer API is used to retrieve the data of one's own organization. The client making API requests also needs to be registered with your organization but doesn't require special approval or authorization.

To make an API request, you need to get an access token using your OAuth 2.0 client credentials. For more information, see [Make an API Request](https://help.sap.com/viewer/dmc-mn-dev-guide/15b2822c62d9489c8e47034665eadda7.html).

Please be aware that the version of most APIs is v1, but the version of the */documents* APIs is v2.

post.description:
Upon the receipt of an event, send a response in an async way to the event framework of Manufacturing Network.

In the callback message, be sure to include the event ID. Add other information as appropriate.

parameters.name: Callback
parameters.description: A callback message

post.description:
Creates a collaboration room.  
The login user must be from a customer.

parameters.name: CollaborationRoomCreateRequest
parameters.description: A request about creating a collaboration room

get.description: Retrieves the information of a collaboration room by its ID.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

parameters.name: CollaborationRoomUpdateRequest
parameters.description: A request about updating a collaboration room

delete.description:
Deletes a collaboration room
The login user must be a collaboration lead for the customer and it must be a new or discarded collaboration.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

get.summary: Retrieves basic info of a collaboration room
get.description: Retrieves the information of a collaboration room in a simplified form.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

post.description:
Sets a collaboration in process.  
The collaboration must be a new collaboration.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

post.description:
Sets a collaboration as completed
- The login user must be a collaboration lead for the customer.
- If there's already a supplier in the collaboration room, the collaboration must already or still be in process.
- If there's already a completed collaboration with the same additive manufacturing supplier, part ID, and customer, this operation fails.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

post.description:
Sets a collaboration as discarded.  
The login user must be a collaboration lead for the customer and the collaboration must be in process or completed.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

post.description:
Reopens a completed collaboration.  
The collaboration is set back to the status 'In Process'.
The login user must be a collaboration lead for the customer.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

get.summary: Retrieves documents in a collaboration room
get.description: Retrieves the information of all documents in a collaboration room, such as design files and specifications.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

get.description: Retrieves the information of a document by its ID.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: The ID of a file

delete.description:
Deletes a document.  
The login user must be the one who uploaded the file.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: The ID of a file

get.summary: Gets conversion info of a design file
get.description:
Retrieves the information of the conversion event for a design file.
A conversion event converts a design file into a VDS file.  
See a full list of supported formats in the [online help](https://help.sap.com/viewer/dmc-mn-app-help-customer/710ee60457ca457cbda854c363bcf71f.html).

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: The ID of a file

post.description:
Invokes a conversion event that converts a design file into a VDS file.

See a full list of supported formats in the [online help](https://help.sap.com/viewer/dmc-mn-app-help-customer/710ee60457ca457cbda854c363bcf71f.html).

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: The ID of a file

parameters.name: Prefer
parameters.description:
Sets the conversion event to run asynchronously.  
Valid value: respond-async

get.description: Retrieves the production data in a collaboration room, including the currency, all the production options, and the initial pricings provided by the supplier.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

post.description:
Creates a new production option, providing the pricing information in the meantime.  
The login user must be a collaboration lead from the additive manufacturing supplier.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

parameters.name: ProductionDataCreateRequest
parameters.description: A request about creating a production option

post.summary: Creates a production option without pricing
post.description:
Creates a new production option without an initial pricing.  
This endpoint is used by users from the additive manufactuirng supplier that're not collaboration leads.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

parameters.name: AdditionalProductionDataBasicCreateRequest
parameters.description: A request about creating a production option without pricing

put.description:
Updates the initial pricing for the customer's production option.  
The login user must be a collaboration lead from an additive manufacturing supplier.  
Note: The planned quantity is defined by the customer and not available for update by the supplier.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

parameters.name: ProductionDataPricingRequest
parameters.description: A request about updating the pricing of a production option

put.description:
Updates the customer's production option.   
The login user must be from the customer.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

parameters.name: ProductionDataRequirementRequest
parameters.description: A request about a production option

put.description:
Updates a production option proposed by the additive manufacturing supplier as well as the initial pricing for this option.  
The login user must be a collaboration lead from the additive manufacturing supplier.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

parameters.name: productionDataId
parameters.description: The ID of a production option

parameters.name: ProductionDataUpdateRequest
parameters.description: A request about updating a production option

delete.description:
Deletes a production option proposed by the additive manufacturing supplier. The initial pricing is deleted along with it.  
The login user must be from the additive manufacturing supplier.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

parameters.name: productionDataId
parameters.description: The ID of a production option

put.description:
Updates a production option proposed by the additive manufacturing supplier.    
This endpoint is used by users from the additive manufactuirng supplier that're not collaboration leads. The initial pricing cannot be updated.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

parameters.name: productionDataId
parameters.description: The ID of a production option

parameters.name: AdditionalProductionDataBasicUpdateRequest
parameters.description: A request about updating a supplier's production option, excluding pricing information

get.description: Retrieves the production option confirmed as the finalized production requirements, and the initial pricing for it.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

post.description:
Confirms a production option along with the initial pricing for it.  
The production option might be proposed by the customer or the additive manufacturing supplier.   
The login user must be from the customer.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

parameters.name: productionDataId
parameters.description: The ID of a production option

post.summary: Cancels the confirmation of a production option
post.description:
Undos the confirmation of a production option.  
The login user must be from the customer.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

parameters.name: productionDataId
parameters.description: The ID of a production option

get.summary: Retrieves the thumbnail of a design file
get.description:
Retrieves the thumbnail information in a collaboration room.
Each design file has a corresponding thumbnail file automatically generated.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

get.description: Retrieves available collaboration room templates.

parameters.name: typeName
parameters.description: The name of a collaboration room template

parameters.name: typeId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room template.

get.description: Downloads a file from a collaboration room.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: The ID of a file

post.summary: Uploads a file to a collaboration room
post.description: Uploads a file to a collaboration room.

parameters.name: fileUpload
parameters.description: A file to be uploaded

parameters.name: originFileDisplay
parameters.description: Indicates if a file is visible to all participants in the collaboration room (public) or to the uploader only (private)

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

get.summary: Downloads the thumbnail of a design file
get.description: Downloads the thumbnail selected as the icon for a collaboration room.

parameters.name: collaborationRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of a collaboration room

post.summary: Uploads a file to the temp folder
post.description: Uploads a file to the temp folder for an organization.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The ID of an organization

parameters.name: fileUpload
parameters.description: A file to be uploaded

get.description:
Retrieves all the extensions that have been registered with Manufacturing Network.  
These extensions are developed by Manufacturing Network customers or partners to enhance the functionality of the application.

Retrieves extensions that can be used during a collaboration.  
A supplier enables an extension for collaboration by selecting it for use in the supplier profile.

parameters.name: organizationIds
parameters.description:
The IDs of organizations as collaboration parties
Separate the IDs using commas.

get.description:
Retrieves master data such as processes and materials.
Narrow down the result by specifying the master data types.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
A master data type
Valid values: [certificates, currencies, materialRequirement, postProcesses, preferredLanguages, processMaterial, servicePortfolio]

post.description:
Creates an order for the part for which the customer and the supplier haven been colloabrating
The order is based on the confirmed production option and pricing.
The login user must be from the customer.

parameters.name: OrderRequest
parameters.description: A request about an order

post.summary: Adds a record to the order history
post.description:
Adds a record to the history of an order.   
The order number is sent in the message body of the Order Created event.  
The login user must be from the additive manufacturing supplier.

parameters.name: orderNumber
parameters.description: An order number

parameters.name: OrderItemRequest
parameters.description: A request about an order

get.description: Retrieves the information of the login user's own organization.

Retrieves organizations in a specific business role that are available for collaboration.  
These organizations may have been approved for or blocked from collaboration, or they're still pending for approval.
The login user must be from a customer.

parameters.name: roleCode
parameters.description:
The code for the business role of the organizations. 1 for manufacturers, 4 for suppliers.  
Valid value: 4.

parameters.name: approved
parameters.description:
Specify approved=true to restrict the search to organizations that are approved for collaboration. Note that approved=false searches for all organizations, approved, blocked, or pending for approval.  
Only approved organizations can be invited for collaboration.

parameters.name: activeServices
parameters.description:
The types of service that a supplier provides.  
Valid values: ["AdditiveManu", "MaterialProvider", "OEM", "OtherServices"].

get.description: Retrieves an organization by its ID.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The ID of an organization

put.description:
Updates the supplier profile of a specific organization.
The login user must be from a supplier.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The ID of an organization

parameters.name: OrganizationUpdateRequest
parameters.description: A request about updating an organization

get.summary: Retrieves the collaboration rooms of an organization
get.description:
Retrieves the collaboration rooms where the login user's organization is a collaboration party.   
- If the login user is not an organization admin, only the collaboration rooms where the login user is a participant are retrieved.   
- If the login user is an organization admin, all the collaboration rooms where the login user's organization is a collaboration party are retrieved. The login user may not be part of the collaborations.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The ID of an organization

parameters.name: organizationIds
parameters.description:
The IDs of organizations as collaboration parties
Separate the IDs using commas.

get.summary: Retrieves the collaboration rooms created by an organization
get.description:
Retrieves the collaboration rooms created and owned by an organization.  
- If the login user is not an organization admin, only the collaboration rooms where the login user is a participant are retrieved.  
- If the login user is an organization admin, all the collaboration rooms owned by the login user's organization are retrieved.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The ID of an organization

parameters.name: organizationIds
parameters.description:
The IDs of organizations as collaboration parties
Separate the IDs using commas.

parameters.name: partId
parameters.description:
The ID of a part.  
Use this parameter to restrict the search to collaboration rooms for a specific part.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
The status of a collaboration.  
Use this parameter to restrict the search to collaboration rooms where the collaboration is in a specific status.  
Valid values: [New, In Process, Completed, Discarded]

parameters.name: serviceType
parameters.description:
The type of service that a supplier organization provides during the collaboration.  
Use this parameter to restrict the search to collaboration rooms where a certain type of service is provided by a supplier.   
This parameter is effective only if you've also specified the organizationIds parameter.  
Valid values: [ADDITIVE_MANU, MATERIAL_PROVIDER, OEM, OTHER_SERVICES]

get.description:
Retrieves the service portfolios of a supplier.   
A supplier may provide more than one type of service. The service profile may be comprised of various service portfolios for different service types.  
- If the login user is not an organization admin, he or she can retrieve only the active service portfolios.  
- if the login user is an organization admin, he or she can retrieve both active and inactive service portfolios.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The ID of an organization

get.description: Retrieves available collaboration room template types.

get.summary: Retrieves the users of an organization
get.description:
Retrieves the users of a specific organization.  
The login user must be from this organization as well.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The ID of an organization

get.description: Retrieves the information of the current login user.

Retrieves the collaboration rooms where a user is a participant.  
- If the login user is not an organization admin, he or she can search only by his or her own user ID and retrieve the collaboration rooms where he or she is a participant.  
- If the login user is an organization admin, he or she can search by the user ID of any user in the same organization.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of a user
